markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[False Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=108)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 337 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Bloodline**
[Undead](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=10)

**Deities**
[Aesocar](/Deities.aspx?ID=403), [Osiris](/Deities.aspx?ID=520), [Qi Zhong](/Deities.aspx?ID=314), [Touch of the Sun](/Deities.aspx?ID=233), [Urgathoa](/Deities.aspx?ID=295)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 8 hours
</row>

</column>

---

You create a reservoir of vitality from necromantic energy, gaining 10 temporary Hit Points.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The temporary Hit Points increase by 3.
name: False Life

text: False Life Two Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 337 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Bloodline Undead Deities Aesocar, Osiris, Qi Zhong, Touch of the Sun, Urgathoa Cast somatic, verbal Duration 8 hours --- You create a reservoir of vitality from necromantic energy, gaining 10 temporary Hit Points. --- Heightened (+1) The temporary Hit Points increase by 3.
